name: AmazingTalker
description: An online platform connecting students with Chinese tutors for personalized lessons. They offer various courses, including those for test preparation. Ratings and reviews are available for individual tutors
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: Preply
description: Similar to AmazingTalker, Preply offers a wide selection of online Chinese tutors. You can find tutors based on your learning goals, including test preparation
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: Wyzant
description: Wyzant is a platform where you can find local and online tutors for various subjects, including Chinese language. Many tutors have detailed profiles with ratings and reviews
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF)
description: UAF offers Chinese language courses (CHNS) as part of its academic programs. These courses can provide a strong foundation for test preparation
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: University of Alaska Anchorage (UAA) Confucius Institute
description: UAA's Confucius Institute has offered non-credit Mandarin Chinese courses for community members, which could be beneficial for language learners
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: Jade Chinese School
description: This school specifically offers HSK (Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi) exam preparation courses, focusing on vocabulary, grammar, and test-taking strategies
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: eBLCU.com
description: Offers online HSK test preparation courses with live lessons from Beijing Language and Culture University teachers
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: FCIAlaska.org (Friends of Chinese Immersion)
description: Supports Chinese immersion programs in Anchorage schools and promotes Chinese language and culture. While not a direct test prep center, immersion can significantly aid language proficiency
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: Alaska Chinese Association
description: This association supports the Chinese community in Anchorage and maintains a Chinese school to teach Mandarin Chinese and foster cultural appreciation. They may offer resources or classes that can help with test preparation
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation

name: Avant Assessment
description: While not a direct preparation center, Avant Assessment provides sample tests for various languages, including Mandarin Chinese, which can be useful for understanding test formats
services: Chinese-speaking Test preparation in Alaska consultation
